amendment.description: To provide for the enhancement of funeral ceremonies for veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4538 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4538 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6388) To provide for the enhancement of funeral ceremonies for veterans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4538 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4538 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Burns.
